name: csc248-pointers-cram
description: Students coordinate a late-night cram session for CSC 248 pointers review.

events.content: Anyone down for a quick pointers review tonight? I'm blanking on pointer arithmetic before tomorrow's quiz.
I'm in. Let's grab the Bonderson fishbowl at 8 p.m.â€”whiteboard + power outlets.
I'll bring the pointer bingo sheet from last year. Also snacks (chips + Red Vines).
Drop your diagrams in this thread afterward so people who can't come still get the cheat sheets.
Perfect! See you at 8. I'll post pics of the board.
